name.value: Nictiz BGZ Load Test Resources - Purge Create Update - XML

description.value: Load BGZ-2-1-1 test resources using the update (PUT) operation of the target FHIR server for use in BGZ-2-1-1 qualification testing. All resource ids are pre-defined. The target XIS FHIR server is expected to support resource create via the update (PUT) operation for client assigned ids.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content)
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content)
